attributes.action: End the protection wings in prisons for paedos, rapist  and child killers
attributes.background: End the protection wings in prisons for paedos, rapist and child killers increase their sentences and stop them getting new identitys on release so they cannot move freely to do it again they get human rights when they commit inhumane crimes it will reduce the crimes knowing there is no protection

rejection.details:
We understand that you're concerned about the punishments given to people who commit particular serious crimes, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the UK Parliament and Government to do. 

You could start a new petition asking for stricter sentences for rape, child sexual abuse and murder, if that's something you'd like to happen. 

You could also sign this petition asking to "Bring back the death penalty for child murderers, rapists and paedophiles":

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234034
